suite.name: mwts-ofono-tests
suite.set:
<case name="FUTE-Verify_PIN" subfeature="Verifies valid pin code" timeout="10" description="" min -c -t 'FUTE-Verify_PIN'
<case name="FUTE-Verify_invalid_PIN" subfeature="Verifies invalid pin code" timeout="10" description="" min -c -t 'FUTE-Verify_invalid_PIN'
<case name="FUTE-Change_PIN" subfeature="Changes pin code" timeout="10" description="" min -c -t 'FUTE-Change_PIN'
<case name="Disable_PIN" subfeature="Disable (unlock) pin code" timeout="10" description="" min -c -t 'Disable_PIN'
<case name="Enable_PIN" subfeature="Enable (lokc) pin code" timeout="10" description="" min -c -t 'Enable_PIN'
